author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Returns a list of all network lists available for an authenticated user who belongs to a group.
commands.name: akamai-get-network-lists

commands.description: Gets a network list by the network list ID.
commands.name: akamai-get-network-list-by-id

commands.description: Creates a new network list. Supports TXT file upload for elements.
commands.name: akamai-create-network-list

commands.description: Deletes the specified network list.
commands.name: akamai-delete-network-list

commands.description: Activates a network list on the specified environment.
commands.name: akamai-activate-network-list

commands.description: Adds elements to the specified network list.
commands.name: akamai-add-elements-to-network-list

commands.description: Removes elements from the specified network list.
commands.name: akamai-remove-element-from-network-list

commands.description: Gets the activation status of the specified network list.
commands.name: akamai-get-network-list-activation-status

commands.description: Updates list elements of a network list.
commands.name: akamai-update-network-list-elements

commands.description: Check an existing group within the context of your account.
commands.name: akamai-check-group

commands.description: Create a new group under a parent GID.

commands.description: Create a new enrollment.
commands.name: akamai-create-enrollment

commands.description: List enrollments of a specific contract.
commands.name: akamai-list-enrollments

commands.description: Create a domain with properties and domain controller (DC).

commands.description: Update a property for a specific domain.
commands.name: akamai-update-property

commands.description: Get the CPS code.
commands.name: akamai-get-change

commands.description: Update the certs and trust chains.
commands.name: akamai-update-change

commands.description: Get enrollment by common name.
commands.name: akamai-get-enrollment-by-cn

commands.description: Lists groups of Akamai.

commands.description: Get group.
commands.name: akamai-get-group

commands.description: Get Google Tag Manager (GTM) domains.
commands.name: akamai-get-domains

commands.description: Get a specific GTM domain.
commands.name: akamai-get-domain

commands.description: Create a data center.
commands.name: akamai-create-datacenter

commands.description: Clone a new PAPI property.
commands.name: akamai-clone-papi-property

commands.description: Add hostnames to the PAPI property.
commands.name: akamai-add-papi-property-hostname

commands.description: Add a PAPI edge hostname.
commands.name: akamai-new-papi-edgehostname

commands.description: Get cps certificate enrollment ID by common name.
commands.name: akamai-get-cps-enrollmentid-by-cnname

commands.description: Create a new PAPI CP code.
commands.name: akamai-new-papi-cpcode

commands.description: Patch PAPI property default rule with a CP code.
commands.name: akamai-patch-papi-property-rule-cpcode

commands.description: Patch PAPI property default rule with an origin.
commands.name: akamai-patch-papi-property-rule-origin

commands.description: Activate a PAPI property.
commands.name: akamai-activate-papi-property

commands.description: AppSec clone security policy.
commands.name: akamai-clone-security-policy

commands.description: AppSec create match target.
commands.name: akamai-new-match-target

commands.description: AppSec activate appsec configuration version.
commands.name: akamai-activate-appsec-config-version

commands.description: AppSec get appsec config activation status.
commands.name: akamai-get-appsec-config-activation-status

commands.description: AppSec get appsec config latest version.
commands.name: akamai-get-appsec-config-latest-version

commands.description: AppSec get security policy ID by name.
commands.name: akamai-get-security-policy-id-by-name

commands.description: AppSec_clone appsec config version
commands.name: akamai-clone-appsec-config-version

commands.description: Patch PAPI property rule HTTP methods.
commands.name: akamai-patch-papi-property-rule-httpmethods

commands.description: Get PAPI property activation status until it is active.
commands.name: akamai-get-papi-property-activation-status-command

commands.description: Get PAPI edgehostname creation status command until it is created.
commands.name: akamai-get-papi-edgehostname-creation-status-command

commands.name: akamai-acknowledge-warning-command

commands.name: akamai-modify-appsec-config-selected-hosts

commands.name: akamai-get-production-deployment

commands.name: akamai-get-change-history

commands.name: akamai-patch-papi-property-rule-siteshield

commands.description: Update application secuirty configuration version notes command
commands.name: akamai-update-appsec-config-version-notes

commands.description: New match target if no existing found otherwise update the existing match target hostnames. If there are multiple match targets found, the first one in the list will be updated
commands.name: akamai-new-or-renew-match-target

commands.name: akamai-patch-papi-property-rule-generic

integration.description:
Use the Akamai WAF integration to manage common sets of lists used by various Akamai security products and features.

This is the modified version where a new command "akamai-update-network-list-elements" was added by the SA.
integration.name: Akamai WAF

playbook.description: Activates network lists in Staging or Production on Akamai WAF. The playbook finishes running when the network list is active on the requested enviorment.
playbook.name: Akamai WAF - Activate Network Lists

description: Use the Akamai WAF integration to manage common sets of lists used by various Akamai security products and features.
name: Akamai WAF
